Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulin (light chain specific) immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens N Latex FLC kappa and lambda assays for quantitative determination of free light chains on BN Systems and Atellica CH Analyzer with new MGUS evaluation claim.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic reagents for quantitative determination of free kappa or lambda light chains in serum and EDTA plasma as an aid in diagnosing and monitoring multiple myeloma, diagnosing and monitoring immunoglobulin light-chain amyloidosis, and evaluating Monoclonal Gammopathy of Undetermined Significance (MGUS), on BN Systems and Atellica CH Analyzer.
